rows.name: Wild Mind
rows.description: High-mindedness is not your forte. Reduce your Intelligence by 5.

rows.name: Little Friends
rows.description: Small creatures find you attractive. Gnawed possessions and animal droppings are the byproduct. You take a -10 penalty to Fellowship Tests when those creatures would be inappropriate.

rows.name: Beast Mark
rows.description: You manifest an animalistic trait (fur, scales, horns) on a part of your body (roll d100 for Hit Location). At GM discretion it may incur a -10 penalty to Fellowship based tests.

rows.name: Claustrophobia
rows.description: You hate being penned in. When unable to see the open sky, you suffer a -10 penalty to Cool Tests. This penalty increases the more enclosed you are, at GM's discretion.

rows.name: Taal's Mien
rows.description: You grow tall and strong, your hair shaggy. Grow 1d10/2 inches taller and 2d10 pounds heavier. Increase your Fellowship Characteristic by 5

rows.name: Animal Friend
rows.description: You are at one with the beasts. Gain the Animal Affinity Talent, and all other beasts (e.g. controlled) must pass a Difficult Willpower test to attack you.

rows.name: Musky Scent
rows.description: You exude an... interesting aroma. Gain a +5 bonus when Charming those who might find you attractive, but take a -10 penalty to Fellowship tests where your animal scent would be inappropriate.

rows.name: Tranquil Fauna
rows.description: Animals are calmed by you. Gain a +10 bonus to Animal Care and Animal Training Tests.

rows.name: Beast Senses
rows.description: You have naturally sharp senses. Gain a +20 bonus to Perception Tests.

rows.name: Marked by Taal
rows.description: A symbol of Taal appears as a mark somewhere on your body (roll 1d100 for Hit Location). You gain +10 bonus to Pray tests when using Miracles of Taal, and +10 bonus to Fellowship tests when dealing with other followers of Taal if they can see the mark.
